full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA BYED TSUL DANG DU BRI LEGS GZHUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA BYED TSUL DU BRI, CHIG ZHUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI CHAS DANG 'BREL BA'I SLOB MA BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA DAD PA MA PHYED PA DANG, LDAN PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, RNAL 'BYOR YANGS BRTZON 'GRUS DANG LDAN PA SMAN RAM PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB SOGS KYI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SLOB MA'I THA SHAL LTO 'KHYAMS PA SKU SKYES BU SU KU SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO, @008B DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB PA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN 'GRUB SHOG , ,,)
author_simple: SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN,
